## ICanvasRenderingContext2D interface

A cross-environment interface for 2D canvas rendering context objects that covers the properties and methods supported by both DOM (as CanvasRenderingContext2D) and canvas-cleave (as NodeCanvasRenderingContext2D)

<b>Signature:</b>

```typescript
export interface ICanvasRenderingContext2D 
```

## Properties

|  Property | Type | Description |
|  --- | --- | --- |
|  [canvas](./canvas-cleave.icanvasrenderingcontext2d.canvas.md) | <code>ICanvas</code> | Reference to the canvas that this rendering context is for. |

## Methods

|  Method | Description |
|  --- | --- |
|  [drawImage(image, dx, dy)](./canvas-cleave.icanvasrenderingcontext2d.drawimage.md) | Draw an image to the canvas at the specified coordinates. |
|  [drawImage(image, sx, sy, sw, sh, dx, dy, dw, dh)](./canvas-cleave.icanvasrenderingcontext2d.drawimage_1.md) | Draw a region of an image to the canvas at the specified coordinates. |
|  [getImageData(sx, sy, sw, sh)](./canvas-cleave.icanvasrenderingcontext2d.getimagedata.md) | Get ImageData for the defined region of the canvas. |
|  [putImageData(data, dx, dy)](./canvas-cleave.icanvasrenderingcontext2d.putimagedata.md) | Replace a region of the canvas with the supplied ImageData. |
|  [putImageData(data, dx, dy, dirtyX, dirtyY, dirtyWidth, dirtyHeight)](./canvas-cleave.icanvasrenderingcontext2d.putimagedata_1.md) | Replace a region of the canvas with a region of the supplied ImageData. |
